actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by Senate employee and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in In Re Possible Violations of 18 U.S.C. section 1001.

summary.text: Directs the Senate legal counsel to represent David F. Zorensky in connection with his testimony in In Re Possible Violations of 18 U.S.C. 1001. Authorizes Mr. Zorensky to testify before the grand jury and in any subsequent proceedings in such case, except concerning matters which are privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by Senate employee and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in In Re Possible Violations of 18 U.S.C. section 1001.
